content: shoofly pie is the june 2017 square for the annual ravelry bam cal designer s notes shoofly pie is a pennsylvania dutch dessert that doesn t seem to have made its way too far from it s place of origin so i thought i would share a slice with my crochet buddies around the world it s basically molasses pie and one of my favorite treats i m also a fan of pennsylvania dutch folk art so this square is a bit inspired by the themes and shapes that are commonly used there i hope you enjoy it visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 1 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 2 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 3 visiting polly s place on ravelry 4 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 5 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 6 1 everytrickonthehook com 2 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 3 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 4 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 5 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 6 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
